00024 QWidget* BusPortsDelegate::createEditor( QWidget* parent, 
00025                                                                                 const QStyleOptionViewItem& option,
00026                                                                                 const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00027 
00028         switch (index.column()) {
00029                 // name and comment need only normal QLineEdit
00030                 case 0:
00031                 case 8: {
00032                         QLineEdit* line = new QLineEdit(parent);
00033                         connect(line, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00034                                 this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00035                         return line;
00036                           }
00037                 // qualifier
00038                 case 1: {
00039                         QComboBox* box = new QComboBox(parent);
00040                         QStringList list;
00041                         list.append(QString("address"));
00042                         list.append(QString("data"));
00043                         list.append(QString("clock"));
00044                         list.append(QString("reset"));
00045                         list.append(QString("any"));
00046                         box->addItems(list);
00047                         return box;
00048                                 }
00049                 // width
00050                 case 2: {
00051                         QSpinBox* box = new QSpinBox(parent);
00052                         box->setRange(1, 99999);
00053                         connect(box, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00054                                 this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00055                         return box;
00056                                 }
00057                 // default value
00058                 case 3: {
00059                         // the editor
00060                         QLineEdit* line = new QLineEdit(parent);
00061 
00062                         // the validator for editor input
00063                         QIntValidator* validator = new QIntValidator(line);
00064                         validator->setRange(0, 99999);
00065 
00066                         line->setValidator(validator);
00067 
00068                         connect(line, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00069                                 this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00070                         return line;
00071                                 }
00072                 // mode
00073                 case 4: {
00074                         QComboBox* box = new QComboBox(parent);
00075                         QStringList list;
00076                         list.append(QString("master"));
00077                         list.append(QString("slave"));
00078                         list.append(QString("system"));
00079                         list.append(QString("any"));
00080                         box->addItems(list);
00081                         connect(box, SIGNAL(destroyed()),
00082                                 this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00083                         return box;
00084                                 }
00085                 // direction of the port
00086                 case 5: {
00087                         QComboBox* box = new QComboBox(parent);
00088                         QStringList list;
00089                         list.append(QString("in"));
00090                         list.append(QString("out"));
00091                         list.append(QString("inout"));
00092                         box->addItems(list);
00093                         connect(box, SIGNAL(destroyed()),
00094                                 this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00095                         return box;
00096                                 }
00097                 // presence
00098                 case 6: {
00099                         QComboBox* box = new QComboBox(parent);
00100                         QStringList list;
00101                         list.append(QString("required"));
00102                         list.append(QString("optional"));
00103                         list.append(QString("illegal"));
00104                         box->addItems(list);
00105                         connect(box, SIGNAL(destroyed()),
00106                                 this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00107                         return box;
00108                                 }
00109                 // driver
00110                 case 7: {
00111                         QComboBox* box = new QComboBox(parent);
00112                         QStringList list;
00113                         list.append(QString("none"));
00114                         list.append(QString("any"));
00115                         list.append(QString("clock"));
00116                         list.append(QString("singleshot"));
00117                         box->addItems(list);
00118                         connect(box, SIGNAL(destroyed()),
00119                                 this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00120                         return box;
00121                                 }
00122                 
00123                 default: {
00124                         return QStyledItemDelegate::createEditor(parent, option, index);
00125                                  }
00126         }
00127 }

00129 void BusPortsDelegate::setEditorData( QWidget* editor, 
00130                                                                          const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00131 
00132         switch (index.column()) {
00133                 // name and comment or default value
00134                 case 0:
00135                 case 8:
00136                 case 3: {
00137                         QLineEdit* line = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00138                         Q_ASSERT_X(line, "BusPortsDelegate::setEditorData",
00139                                 "Type conversion failed for QLineEdit");
00140 
00141                         QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00142                         line->setText(text);
00143                         break;
00144                           }
00145                 // qualifier, mode, direction, presence, driver
00146                 case 1: 
00147                 case 4:
00148                 case 5: 
00149                 case 6: 
00150                 case 7: {
00151                         QComboBox* box = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00152                         Q_ASSERT_X(box, "BusPortsDelegate::setEditorData",
00153                                 "Type conversion failed for combo box");
00154 
00155                         QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00156                         int index = box->findText(text);
00157 
00158                         box->setCurrentIndex(index);
00159                         break;
00160                                 }
00161                 // width
00162                 case 2: {
00163                         QSpinBox* box = qobject_cast<QSpinBox*>(editor);
00164                         Q_ASSERT_X(box, "BusPortsDelegate::setEditorData",
00165                                 "Type conversion failed for width spin box");
00166 
00167                         int width = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toInt();
00168                         box->setValue(width);
00169                         break;
00170                                 }
00171                 default: {
00172                         QStyledItemDelegate::setEditorData(editor, index);
00173                         break;
00174                                  }
00175         }
00176 }

00178 void BusPortsDelegate::setModelData( QWidget* editor,
00179                                                                         QAbstractItemModel* model, 
00180                                                                         const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00181 
00182         switch (index.column()) {
00183                 // name and comment or default value
00184                 case 0:
00185                 case 8: 
00186                 case 3: {
00187                         QLineEdit* line = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00188                         Q_ASSERT_X(line, "BusPortsDelegate::setModelData",
00189                                 "Type conversion failed for normal QLineEdit");
00190 
00191                         QString text = line->text();
00192                         model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00193                         break;
00194                           }
00195                 // qualifier, mode, direction, presence, driver
00196                 case 1: 
00197                 case 4:
00198                 case 5: 
00199                 case 6: 
00200                 case 7: {
00201                         QComboBox* box = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00202                         Q_ASSERT_X(box, "BusPortsDelegate::setModelData",
00203                                 "Type conversion failed for combo box");
00204 
00205                         QString text = box->currentText();
00206                         model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00207                         break;
00208                                 }
00209                 // width
00210                 case 2: {
00211                         QSpinBox* box = qobject_cast<QSpinBox*>(editor);
00212                         Q_ASSERT_X(box, "BusPortsDelegate::setModelData",
00213                                 "Type conversion failed for spin box");
00214 
00215                         int value = box->value();
00216                         model->setData(index, value, Qt::EditRole);
00217                         break;
00218                                 }
00219                 default: {
00220                         QStyledItemDelegate::setModelData(editor, model, index);
00221                         break;
00222                                  }
00223         }
00224 }
00225 
00226 void BusPortsDelegate::commitAndCloseEditor() {
00227         // try to get pointer to editor in both cases
00228         QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(sender());
00229         QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(sender());
00230         QSpinBox* spinBox = qobject_cast<QSpinBox*>(sender());
00231 
00232         // if the editor was combo box
00233         if (combo) {
00234                 emit commitData(combo);
00235                 emit closeEditor(combo);
00236         }
00237 
00238         // if the editor was spinBox
00239         else if (spinBox) {
00240                 emit commitData(spinBox);
00241                 emit closeEditor(spinBox);
00242         }
00243 
00244         // if editor was line edit
00245         else if (lineEdit) {
00246                 emit commitData(lineEdit);
00247                 emit closeEditor(lineEdit);
00248         }
00249 }
